name: Basic
description: Basic elf heritage with no special modifications.

name: Blightborn
description: Blightborn elves are touched by dark energies, granting them resistances to necromantic and curse effects, as well as a bonus against demon-type outsiders.

name: Loremaster
description: Loremaster elves possess heightened knowledge and skill with magical devices, reflecting their deep understanding of arcane lore.

name: Basic
description: Basic dwarf heritage with no special modifications.

name: Barrow Dwarf
description: Barrow dwarves are deeply connected to their ancestral past, gaining bonuses to religious lore and attacks against undead.

name: Unstoppable Dwarf
description: Unstoppable dwarves possess the Endurance trait, which grants them a bonus to Fortitude saving throws.

name: Basic
description: Basic gnome heritage with no special modifications.

name: Pyromaniac
description: Pyromaniac gnomes are naturally attuned to fire magic, gaining resistance to fire damage and a bonus to Fire spell DCs.

name: Traveler
description: Travelers are gnomes who have embraced a nomadic lifestyle, gaining bonuses to nature lore and becoming more agile.

name: Basic
description: Basic halfling heritage with no special modifications.

name: Craven
description: Craven halflings are more susceptible to fear effects but are exceptionally nimble, gaining a bonus to Reflex saves. Become shaken instead of frightened.

name: Hasty
description: Hasty Halflings are exceptionally quick, sacrificing some stability and fearlessness for increased speed and agility. Bonus to initiative rolls.

name: Basic
description: Basic half-elf heritage with no special modifications.

name: Dual Heritage
description: Half-elves with dual heritage gain the benefits of both elven and human ancestry, including a bonus to Will saves.

name: Kindred-Raised
description: Kindred-raised half-elves are nurtured among humans, leading to a stronger charisma at the expense of some elven traits.

name: Basic
description: Basic half-orc heritage with no special modifications.

name: Human-Raised
description: Human-raised half-orcs are nurtured among humans, leading to a stronger charisma at the expense of some orcish traits.

name: Tribal
description: Tribal half-orcs are raised in the wilds, gaining a bonus to Lore(Nature) and improved saving throws.

name: Aasimar
description: Aasimar heritage grants a bonus to Wisdom and Charisma, as well as bonuses to Persuasion(Diplomacy) and Perception skills.

name: Angelkin (Angel-Blooded)
description: Angelkin (Angel-Blooded) heritage grants a bonus to Strength and Charisma, as well as bonuses to Lore(Religion) and Use Magic Device skills.

name: Emberkin (Peri-Blooded)
description: Emberkin (Peri-Blooded) heritage grants a bonus to Intelligence and Charisma, as well as bonuses to Lore(Religion) and Knowledge(Arcana) skills.

name: Idyllkin (Agathion-Blooded)
description: Idyllkin (Agathion-Blooded) heritage grants a bonus to Constitution and Charisma, as well as bonuses to Lore(Nature) and Perception skills.

name: Lawbringer (Archon-Blooded)
description: Lawbringer (Archon-Blooded) heritage grants a bonus to Wisdom and Constitution, as well as bonuses to Persuasion and Perception skills.

name: Musetouched (Azata-Blooded)
description: Musetouched (Azata-Blooded) heritage grants a bonus to Dexterity and Charisma, as well as bonuses to Persuasion and Mobility skills.

name: Plumekith (Garuda-Blooded)
description: Plumekith (Garuda-Blooded) heritage grants a bonus to Wisdom and Dexterity, as well as bonuses to Mobility and Athletics skills.

name: Beastbrood (Rakshasa-Spawn)
description: Beastbrood (Rakshasa-Spawn) heritage grants a bonus to Dexterity and Charisma, as well as bonuses to Perception and Persuasion(Bluff) skills.

name: Faultspawn (Asura-Spawn)
description: Faultspawn (Asura-Spawn) heritage grants a bonus to Dexterity and Wisdom, as well as bonuses to Knowledge(Arcana) and Knowledge(World) skills.

name: Foulspawn (Demodand-Spawn)
description: Foulspawn (Demodand-Spawn) heritage grants a bonus to Constitution and Wisdom, as well as bonuses to Lore(Religion) and Persuasion(Intimidate) skills.

name: Grimspawn (Daemon-Spawn)
description: Grimspawn (Daemon-Spawn) heritage grants a bonus to Dexterity and Intelligence, as well as bonuses to Trickery and Persuasion(Bluff) skills.

name: Hellspawn (Devil-Spawn)
description: Hellspawn (Devil-Spawn) heritage grants a bonus to Constitution and Wisdom, as well as bonuses to Persuasion(Diplomacy) and Perception skills. No penalty to Charisma if you have the Infernal Bloodline.

name: Hungerseed (Oni-Spawn)
description: Hungerseed (Oni-Spawn) heritage grants a bonus to Strength and Wisdom, as well as bonuses to Persuasion skills.

name: Motherless (Qlippoth-Spawn)
description: Motherless (Qlippoth-Spawn) heritage grants a bonus to Strength and Wisdom, as well as bonuses to Mobility and Lore(Nature) skills.

name: Pitborn (Demon-Spawn)
description: Pitborn (Demon-Spawn) heritage grants a bonus to Strength and Charisma, as well as bonuses to Trickery and Perception skills. Bonus to confirm critical hits.

name: Shackleborn (Kyton-Spawn)
description: Shackleborn (Kyton-Spawn) heritage grants a bonus to Constitution and Charisma, as well as bonuses to Mobility and Persuasion(Intimidate) skills.

name: Spitespawn (Div-Spawn)
description: Spitespawn (Div-Spawn) heritage grants a bonus to Dexterity and Charisma, as well as bonuses to Knowledge(World) and Persuasion(Diplomacy) skills.

name: Tiefling
description: Tiefling heritage grants a bonus to Dexterity and Intelligence, as well as bonuses to Persuasion(Bluff) and Stealth skills. No penalty to Charisma with the Abyssal or Infernal bloodlines.

name: Gemsoul (Crystal Oread)
description: Gemsoul (Crystal Oread) heritage grants a bonus to Strength and Charisma, as well as the Color Spray spell.

name: Ironsoul (Metal Oread)
description: Ironsoul (Metal Oread) heritage grants a bonus to Constitution and Wisdom, as well as the Lead Blades spell.

name: Oread
description: Oread heritage grants a bonus to Strength and Wisdom, as well as the Stone Fist spell.

name: Dhampir
description: Dhampir heritage grants a bonus to Dexterity and Charisma, as well as bonuses to Persuasion(Bluff) and Perception skills.

name: Jiang-Shi-Born (Ru-Shi)
description: Jiang-Shi-Born (Ru-Shi) heritage grants a bonus to Strength and Intelligence, as well as bonuses to Mobility and Knowledge(World) skills.

name: Moroi-Born (Svetocher)
description: Moroi-Born (Svetocher) heritage grants a bonus to Strength and Charisma, as well as bonuses to Persuasion(Diplomacy) and Knowledge(World) skills.

name: Nosferatu-Born (Ancient-Born)
description: Nosferatu-Born (Ancient-Born) heritage grants a bonus to Strength and Wisdom, as well as bonuses to Athletics and Lore(Nature) skills.

name: Vampire King-Born (Sacred Ancestry)
description: Vampire King-Born (Sacred Ancestry) heritage grants a bonus to Strength and Intelligence, as well as bonuses to Persuasion(Diplomacy) and Knowledge(World) skills.

name: Vetala-Born (Ajibachana)
description: Vetala-Born (Ajibachana) heritage grants a bonus to Dexterity and Intelligence, as well as bonuses to Stealth and Use Magic Device skills.

name: Keen Kitsune
description: Keen Kitsune heritage grants a bonus to Dexterity and Intelligence, as well as a penalty to Strength.

name: Kitsune
description: Kitsune heritage grants a bonus to Dexterity and Charisma, as well as a penalty to Strength.
